title: Ten
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Students will become familiar with the high-frequency word ten in this repetitive story. The text provides information about the number ten through detailed, colorful illustrations and simple text. Students will enjoy searching the illustrations for the 10 hidden in each picture. Use this book to teach students about finding details to support the main idea and identifying plural nouns.
highFrequencyWords: Leveled Book Lesson PDF
awareness: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
phonics: Initial Sound                : Discriminate initial consonant /p/ sound
wordWork: Plural Nouns                : Recognize and use plural nouns
